# **Colorify**

<https://zimanaanalytics.medium.com/the-colorify-package-for-r-programming-build-intuitive-color-palettes-for-your-data-visualizations-ab6b01fcbc21>

There is no package called Colorify

```{r}
install.packages("colorspace")
library(colorspace)

# Show available palettes
hcl_palettes()

```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
base_colors <- qualitative_hcl(4, palette = "viridis")
base_colors
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
